snippet: Former Italian Premier Mario Monti came out Tuesday against a constitutional referendum on which the government's current leader has staked his future, lending weight to the "no" campaign seeking to force early elections....

headline.main: Former Italian Premier Monti Comes Out Against Referendum
headline.print_headline: Former Italian Premier Monti Comes Out Against Referendum

lead_paragraph: Former Italian Premier Mario Monti came out Tuesday against a constitutional referendum on which the government's current leader has staked his future, lending weight to the "no" campaign seeking to force early elections.

snippet: ESPN pays $1.9 billion annually for its N.F.L. rights, nearly twice what NBC shells out, but “Monday Night Football” is not the powerhouse it once was....

headline.main: ESPN Pays Top Dollar for Football, but Audience Isn’t Buying
headline.print_headline: Network Pays Top Dollar, but Audience Isn’t Buying

abstract: Richard Sandomir TV Sports column notes that ESPN continues to pay high price for its NFL rights, despite dismal Monday Night Football ratings.
lead_paragraph: ESPN pays $1.9 billion annually for its N.F.L. rights, nearly twice what NBC shells out, but “Monday Night Football” is not the powerhouse it once was.

snippet: Libya's new prime minister called on the international community to help his country bolster its fight against terrorism on Sunday, urging the lifting an arms embargo and release of funds that remain frozen under U.N. sanctions....

headline.main: Libya Premier Urges Lifting of Arms Embargo, Asset Freeze
headline.print_headline: Libya Premier Urges Lifting of Arms Embargo, Asset Freeze

lead_paragraph: Libya's new prime minister called on the international community to help his country bolster its fight against terrorism on Sunday, urging the lifting an arms embargo and release of funds that remain frozen under U.N. sanctions.

headline.main: Bournemouth Hand Palace Fifth Successive League Defeat
headline.print_headline: Bournemouth Hand Palace Fifth Successive League Defeat

snippet: Manchester City's players must take the blame for a poor second half of the season that has left their Champions League hopes hanging by a thread, Bacary Sagna said, but the full back still believes they deserve a spot in Europe's elite club compe...

headline.main: Man City Deserve Champions League Spot-Sagna
headline.print_headline: Man City Deserve Champions League Spot-Sagna

lead_paragraph: Manchester City's players must take the blame for a poor second half of the season that has left their Champions League hopes hanging by a thread, Bacary Sagna said, but the full back still believes they deserve a spot in Europe's elite club competition.

snippet: Chinese-owned Wanda Sports Holding played down a report on Friday that it was backing plans to launch a club soccer tournament to rival the European Champions League....

headline.main: China's Wanda Plays Down Champions League Report
headline.print_headline: China's Wanda Plays Down Champions League Report

lead_paragraph: Chinese-owned Wanda Sports Holding played down a report on Friday that it was backing plans to launch a club soccer tournament to rival the European Champions League.

snippet: Tottenham Hotspur are motivated by the desire to prove themselves against quality teams in the Champions League, manager Mauricio Pochettino said....

headline.main: Spurs Motivated by Champions League Challenge-Pochettino
headline.print_headline: Spurs Motivated by Champions League Challenge-Pochettino

lead_paragraph: Tottenham Hotspur are motivated by the desire to prove themselves against quality teams in the Champions League, manager Mauricio Pochettino said.

snippet: Newcastle United have told their fans that they expected to be in a better position in the Premier League than third-bottom considering their huge transfer outlay....

headline.main: Newcastle's League Position Very Disappointing, Club Say
headline.print_headline: Newcastle's League Position Very Disappointing, Club Say

lead_paragraph: Newcastle United have told their fans that they expected to be in a better position in the Premier League than third-bottom considering their huge transfer outlay.

snippet: Manchester City winger Raheem Sterling has said a first Champions League quarter-final will not be enough and the English side should be aiming to lift the trophy with the talent in their squad....

headline.main: Man City's Sterling Raises Champions League Expectations
headline.print_headline: Man City's Sterling Raises Champions League Expectations

lead_paragraph: Manchester City winger Raheem Sterling has said a first Champions League quarter-final will not be enough and the English side should be aiming to lift the trophy with the talent in their squad.

snippet: Robert Lewandowski struck twice to steer champions Bayern Munich to a 2-1 win at Hamburg SV on Friday that stretched their lead at the top to 11 points as the Bundesliga resumed following a one-month winter break....

headline.main: Lewandowski Double Lifts Bayern on League Restart
headline.print_headline: Lewandowski Double Lifts Bayern on League Restart

lead_paragraph: Robert Lewandowski struck twice to steer champions Bayern Munich to a 2-1 win at Hamburg SV on Friday that stretched their lead at the top to 11 points as the Bundesliga resumed following a one-month winter break.
